references.paper_title: Matt: A manifold attention network for EEG decoding
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel manifold attention network for EEG decoding, addressing a key challenge in brain-computer interfaces.

references.paper_title: Spd domain-specific batch normalization to crack interpretable unsupervised domain adaptation in eeg
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for domain adaptation in EEG, improving the robustness and generalizability of EEG-based decoding models.

references.paper_title: Deep learning human mind for automated visual classification
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the application of deep learning for visual classification based on EEG data, achieving high accuracy and establishing a benchmark for subsequent studies.

references.paper_title: Learning robust deep visual representations from eeg brain recordings
references.reason: This paper focuses on learning robust deep visual representations from EEG, contributing to advancements in image-based BCI and addressing challenges associated with variability and noise.

references.paper_title: Brain2image: Converting brain signals into images
references.reason: This paper presents a pioneering approach to convert brain signals into images, which has significantly contributed to the field of image-based BCIs and related research.
